wikipedia_page.main: William James Cross (21 November 1917 – 29 June 2015) was a British soldier who fought in World War II. He participated in battles in Palestine, Salerno, and at Normandy shortly after D-Day. In 2015, he was awarded the Légion d’honneur.

response: * 21 November – Bill Cross, World War II soldier (died 2015)
*Bill Cross, 97, British World War II soldier and Legion of honour recipient.Bill Cross, Chelsea pensioner - obituary
